title.rendered: Prudent Financial Corporation Application Form RCF IF

content.rendered:
APPLICATION

apply for funding

To start your Prudent Financial Corporation Business Loan application please complete the form below, if you have any issues with the form please contact cbils@pfc-group.org and a member of our team will be happy to help

Eligibility Criteria

  • UK registered businesses
  • Turnover: £500k-£45m
  • 12 months trading history
  • Over 50% of turnover from trading activity (e.g. not from investments)
  • Facility primarily for trading activity in the UK
  • The company has been impacted by the coronavirus pandemic

Documents Required

You’ll need to email the following:

  • 2019 Year-End Profit and Loss statement
  • 2019 Year-End Balance Sheet
  • Year-to-date Profit and Loss statement
  • Year-to-date Balance sheet
  • Last 3 months business bank statements
  • Cash flow or profit-and-loss forecast for the next 18 months or ideally next 36 months

Information

  • You can only add one file to each upload box
  • Accepted file types include .pdf, .docx, .xlsx, .csv
- Step 1 of 4
Min £10k - Max £5m
//

A business is in difficulty if, as at 31 December 2019:


  • It was more than three years old and had accumulated losses of more than 50% of share capital;
  • It had entered into administration, CVA or similar;
  • It had previously received rescue or restructuring aid from the UK government or the European Union that was yet to be reimbursed (or, in the case of a guarantee, terminated)
E.g. debenture charge from another lender
If yes, please state the names of the institution(s)
  • Banking
  • Building societies
  • Insurers and reinsurers (but not insurance brokers)
  • Public sector (including state-funded primary and secondary schools)
  • Gambling
  • Real estate/property development
  • Farming and agriculture
Click or drag a file to this area to upload.
Please upload any supporting information/previous applications to support your application which provides an overview of your business activities/performance of your business prior to the onset of COVID-19/how you intend to use the funds?
Please confirm you understand that you are liable for 100% of any facility that may be provided and that Prudent Financial Corporation will always seek to recover the outstanding balance from you and the proceeds of any security you, or any security provider on your behalf, has given for the loan.
We use our secure portal to sync your accounting software such as Xero or Quickbooks, this allows you to safely and quickly supply all the necessary information for your application to be processed, once you submit your application you will be taken to the portal automatically. Alternatively, if you select No you can upload these files manually. Once you submit this form, you will be taken through to sync your accounting data.

Please provide the following documents

Click or drag a file to this area to upload.

Click or drag a file to this area to upload.

Last 3 Months Bank Statements

For us to be able to process your application, please provide your last 3 months bank statements. These must be supplied as PDF files.
